dimensions:
H x W x diam.: 30.5 x 17 x 7 cm (12 x 6 11/16 x 2 3/4 in.)
diam. (body): 8.5 cm (3 3/8 in.)
title: Coffee pot
provenance: Walter H. Wilson, Ltd., London; 1967 WPW
description: Tall pear-shaped body on collet foot; hinged domed lid with ball finial; long, flat spout with shallow flutes, joined at bottom with shell mount; long hardwood loop handle joined at bottom with long tubular socket and at top with elaborate acanthus mount; beading around base of lid.
name: Coffee pot
